name: Question Type Concept Maps
tagline: Question type for Moodle which uses a Concept Map editor for students to draw CMs as answers
body:
### Question Type Concept Maps
Concept Maps, proposed originally by Joseph Novak, are widely used in educational scenarios for their excellent to represent learner's knowledge.

### Authors and Contributors
You can @mention a GitHub username to generate a link to their profile. The resulting `<a>` element will link to the contributor's GitHub Profile. For example: In 2007, Chris Wanstrath (@defunkt), PJ Hyett (@pjhyett), and Tom Preston-Werner (@mojombo) founded GitHub.
